name: location_allocation
description: Optimization function for facility location and demand point allocation using linear programming

parameters.name: optimization_strategy
parameters.description: Optimization strategy: 'minimize_total_cost', 'minimize_max_cost', or 'maximize_coverage'

parameters.name: facility_id
parameters.description: Array of facility identifiers

parameters.name: facility_type
parameters.description: Array of facility types (0=optional, 1=required, 2=competitor)

parameters.name: facility_group_id
parameters.description: Array of facility group identifiers

parameters.name: facility_min_usage
parameters.description: Array of minimum usage for facilities

parameters.name: facility_max_capacity
parameters.description: Array of maximum capacity for facilities

parameters.name: facility_cost_of_open
parameters.description: Array of costs for opening each facility

parameters.name: dpoint_id
parameters.description: Array of demand point identifiers

parameters.name: dpoint_demand
parameters.description: Array of demand values for each demand point

parameters.name: cost_facility_id
parameters.description: Array of facility IDs for cost matrix

parameters.name: cost_dpoint_id
parameters.description: Array of demand point IDs for cost matrix

parameters.name: cost
parameters.description: Array of costs between facilities and demand points

parameters.name: compatibility_facility_id
parameters.description: Array of facility IDs for compatibility constraints

parameters.name: compatibility_dpoint_id
parameters.description: Array of demand point IDs for compatibility constraints

parameters.name: compatibility_type
parameters.description: Array of compatibility types (0=forbidden, 1=required)

parameters.name: required
parameters.description: Whether to enforce required facility constraints

parameters.name: max_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of facilities to open

parameters.name: max_group_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of facilities per group

parameters.name: min_usage
parameters.description: Whether to enforce minimum usage constraints

parameters.name: max_capacity
parameters.description: Whether to enforce maximum capacity constraints

parameters.name: compatibility
parameters.description: Whether to enforce compatibility constraints

parameters.name: add_demand
parameters.description: Whether to include demand values in optimization

parameters.name: add_fixed_costs
parameters.description: Whether to include facility opening costs

parameters.name: coverage_radius
parameters.description: Coverage radius for maximize_coverage strategy

parameters.name: budget_constraint
parameters.description: Budget limit for facility opening costs

parameters.name: time_limit
parameters.description: Time limit for optimization in seconds

parameters.name: relative_gap
parameters.description: Relative optimality gap tolerance

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Whether to enable verbose output

returns.type: ARRAY<STRUCT<facility_id STRING, dpoint_id STRING, demand FLOAT64, objective_value FLOAT64, gap FLOAT64, solving_time FLOAT64, termination_reason STRING, stats STRING>>
returns.description: Array of allocation results with facility-demand point assignments and optimization metrics
